title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7.25 - Notice for establishing regular lists for reactivated and new piers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7.25 - Notice for establishing regular lists for reactivated and new piers

State Regulations

An employer shall give 30 days' notice to the commission
prior to filing regular lists for a reactivated or new pier. The commission may
reduce the time required for such notice. The commission shall post such notice
in each employment information center for a period of not less than one
week. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
7.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
